citeinfo.title: Marine Data From Dong Shan Station of China

descript.abstract: The data cover the quasi-real time data from Dong Shan Station of china, including sea temperature and salinity, wave height, wave period, visibility, air temperature, air pressure, precipitation, wind speed and wind direction from January 2010 to December 2010. The format is an ASCII(character) format. There is one data file for each month. Code identification, decoding, format check, code transform, standardization, primary quality control, visual inspection, calibration, etc, are carried out before the creation of standard format datasets. The quality control procedure includes range check, illegal code check, station identification check, etc.
descript.purpose: To collect and archive marine data from Chinese coastal stations.

cntorgp.cntorg: National Marine Data and Information Service, SOA, China

cntaddr.address: No.93, Liuwei Road, Hedong District, Tianjin

cntperp.cntorg: National Marine Data and Information Service

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Biological Data Profile of the Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
